title: Curly Girl: The Handbook
description:
Curly Girl: The Handbook by Michele Bender, Lorraine Massey, Deborah Chiel
2011 | ISBN: 076115678X | English | 176 Pages | EPUB | 3.75 MB

he Curly Girl manifesto is back, now completely revised, updated, and expanded by more than a third with all-new material. Created by curly hair evangelist Lorraine MasseyÃ¢â‚¬â€the go-to curl expert featured in Allure, InStyle, Lucky, Seventeen, and The New York Times; owner of the Devachan salons in New York; and creator of a multimillion-dollar line of all-natural Devachan productsÃ¢â‚¬â€Curly Girl is the surprising bible for the 65 percent of women with naturally curly or wavy hair and a desire to celebrate it.

Curly Girl is packed with unique and fail-proof hair-care methods, inspiration, and an empowering pro-curl attitude. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all here: daily routines for Botticelli, fractal, and wavy curls; LorraineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no-more-shampoo epiphanyÃ¢â‚¬â€handle your hair as gently as you do your best cashmere sweater; homemade lotions and potions.
